about.heading: ABOUT US
about.text:
Welcome to SAFFRON, a culinary destination where the vibrant flavors of India come alive. Nestled in the heart of the city, SAFFRON offers an elevated dining experience that artfully blends timeless Indian recipes with modern flair.

Our menu is a celebration of India's rich culinary heritage—featuring signature dishes like our velvety Butter Chicken, fragrant Hyderabadi Biryani, and bold, spiced Rogan Josh. From the sizzling tandoori kebabs to indulgent vegetarian favorites like Paneer Tikka Masala and Dal Makhani, every dish is thoughtfully prepared using authentic spices and the freshest ingredients.

At SAFFRON, we invite you to savor the essence of India, where every meal is a journey and every bite tells a story.
